title: Vote now for your favorite Spring '25 architecture school lecture poster
author: Alexander Walter
byline: By Alexander Walter Jun 10, '25 6:10 PM EST
excerpt: The Spring 2025 academic term has officially concluded, and we'd like you, dear Archinect reader, to once again select your favorite architecture school lecture poster designs we have presented in our Get Lectured series during this past semester. Our last reader poll for the Fall 2024 term ended...
text: The Spring 2025 academic term has officially concluded, and we'd like you, dear Archinect reader, to once again select your favorite architecture school lecture poster designs we have presented in our Get Lectured series during this past semester. Our last reader poll for the Fall 2024 term ended with UCLA's School of Architecture and Urban Design poster winning the top prize, followed by Cal Poly San Luis Obispo's poster in second place and Pratt Institute School of Architecture design taking home third. Check out the 25 posters we've featured throughout the Spring '25 term. Voting closes on Tuesday, June 24, at noon Pacific Time. The lecture posters with the most votes will be announced on Wednesday, June 25. Have fun! Want to share your school's upcoming lecture series and be included in the next Fall 2025 series? Send us your poster design and event details.
html:
The Spring 2025 academic term has officially concluded, and we'd like you, dear Archinect reader, to once again select your favorite architecture school lecture poster designs we have presented in our Get Lectured series during this past semester.

Our last reader poll for the Fall 2024 term ended with UCLA's School of Architecture and Urban Design poster winning the top prize, followed by Cal Poly San Luis Obispo's poster in second place and Pratt Institute School of Architecture design taking home third.

Check out the 25 posters we've featured throughout the Spring '25 term.

Voting closes on Tuesday, June 24, at noon Pacific Time. The lecture posters with the most votes will be announced on Wednesday, June 25. Have fun!

Want to share your school's upcoming lecture series and be included in the next Fall 2025 series? Send us your poster design and event details.
